4177static void free_pg_vec(struct pgv *pg_vec, unsigned int order,
4178 unsigned int len)
4179{
4180 int i;
4181
4182 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
4183 if (likely(pg_vec[i].buffer)) {
4184 if (is_vmalloc_addr(pg_vec[i].buffer))
4185 vfree(pg_vec[i].buffer);
4186 else
4187 free_pages((unsigned long)pg_vec[i].buffer,
4188 order);
4189 pg_vec[i].buffer = NULL;
4190 }
4191 }
4192 kfree(pg_vec);
4193}
4194
4195static char *alloc_one_pg_vec_page(unsigned long order)
4196{
4197 char *buffer;
4198 gfp_t gfp_flags = GFP_KERNEL | __GFP_COMP |
4199 __GFP_ZERO | __GFP_NOWARN | __GFP_NORETRY;
4200
4201 buffer = (char *) __get_free_pages(gfp_flags, order);
4202 if (buffer)
4203 return buffer;
4204
4205 /* __get_free_pages failed, fall back to vmalloc */
4206 buffer = vzalloc((1 << order) * PAGE_SIZE);
4207 if (buffer)
4208 return buffer;
4209
4210 /* vmalloc failed, lets dig into swap here */
4211 gfp_flags &= ~__GFP_NORETRY;
4212 buffer = (char *) __get_free_pages(gfp_flags, order);
4213 if (buffer)
4214 return buffer;
4215
4216 /* complete and utter failure */
4217 return NULL;
4218}
4219
4220static struct pgv *alloc_pg_vec(struct tpacket_req *req, int order)
4221{
4222 unsigned int block_nr = req->tp_block_nr;
4223 struct pgv *pg_vec;
4224 int i;
4225
4226 pg_vec = kcalloc(block_nr, sizeof(struct pgv), GFP_KERNEL);
4227 if (unlikely(!pg_vec))
4228 goto out;
4229
4230 for (i = 0; i < block_nr; i++) {
4231 pg_vec[i].buffer = alloc_one_pg_vec_page(order);
4232 if (unlikely(!pg_vec[i].buffer))
4233 goto out_free_pgvec;
4234 }
4235
4236out:
4237 return pg_vec;
4238
4239out_free_pgvec:
4240 free_pg_vec(pg_vec, order, block_nr);
4241 pg_vec = NULL;
4242 goto out;
4243}
4244
4245static int packet_set_ring(struct sock *sk, union tpacket_req_u *req_u,
4246 int closing, int tx_ring)
4247{
4248 struct pgv *pg_vec = NULL;
4249 struct packet_sock *po = pkt_sk(sk);
4250 int was_running, order = 0;
4251 struct packet_ring_buffer *rb;
4252 struct sk_buff_head *rb_queue;
4253 __be16 num;
4254 int err = -EINVAL;
4255 /* Added to avoid minimal code churn */
4256 struct tpacket_req *req = &req_u->req;
4257
4258 rb = tx_ring ? &po->tx_ring : &po->rx_ring;
4259 rb_queue = tx_ring ? &sk->sk_write_queue : &sk->sk_receive_queue;
4260
4261 err = -EBUSY;
4262 if (!closing) {
4263 if (atomic_read(&po->mapped))
4264 goto out;
4265 if (packet_read_pending(rb))
4266 goto out;
4267 }
4268
4269 if (req->tp_block_nr) {
4270 /* Sanity tests and some calculations */
4271 err = -EBUSY;
4272 if (unlikely(rb->pg_vec))
4273 goto out;
4274
4275 switch (po->tp_version) {
4276 case TPACKET_V1:
4277 po->tp_hdrlen = TPACKET_HDRLEN;
4278 break;
4279 case TPACKET_V2:
4280 po->tp_hdrlen = TPACKET2_HDRLEN;
4281 break;
4282 case TPACKET_V3:
4283 po->tp_hdrlen = TPACKET3_HDRLEN;
4284 break;
4285 }
4286
4287 err = -EINVAL;
4288 if (unlikely((int)req->tp_block_size <= 0))
4289 goto out;
4290 if (unlikely(!PAGE_ALIGNED(req->tp_block_size)))
4291 goto out;
4292 if (po->tp_version >= TPACKET_V3 &&
4293 req->tp_block_size <=
4294 BLK_PLUS_PRIV((u64)req_u->req3.tp_sizeof_priv) + sizeof(struct tpacket3_hdr))
4295 goto out;
4296 if (unlikely(req->tp_frame_size < po->tp_hdrlen +
4297 po->tp_reserve))
4298 goto out;
4299 if (unlikely(req->tp_frame_size & (TPACKET_ALIGNMENT - 1)))
4300 goto out;
4301
4302 rb->frames_per_block = req->tp_block_size / req->tp_frame_size;
4303 if (unlikely(rb->frames_per_block == 0))
4304 goto out;
4305 if (unlikely(req->tp_block_size > UINT_MAX / req->tp_block_nr))
4306 goto out;
4307 if (unlikely((rb->frames_per_block * req->tp_block_nr) !=
4308 req->tp_frame_nr))
4309 goto out;
4310
4311 err = -ENOMEM;
4312 order = get_order(req->tp_block_size);
4313 pg_vec = alloc_pg_vec(req, order);
4314 if (unlikely(!pg_vec))
4315 goto out;
4316 switch (po->tp_version) {
4317 case TPACKET_V3:
4318 /* Block transmit is not supported yet */
4319 if (!tx_ring) {
4320 init_prb_bdqc(po, rb, pg_vec, req_u);
4321 } else {
4322 struct tpacket_req3 *req3 = &req_u->req3;
4323
4324 if (req3->tp_retire_blk_tov ||
4325 req3->tp_sizeof_priv ||
4326 req3->tp_feature_req_word) {
4327 err = -EINVAL;
4328 goto out;
4329 }
4330 }
4331 break;
4332 default:
4333 break;
4334 }
4335 }
4336 /* Done */
4337 else {
4338 err = -EINVAL;
4339 if (unlikely(req->tp_frame_nr))
4340 goto out;
4341 }
4342
4343
4344 /* Detach socket from network */
4345 spin_lock(&po->bind_lock);
4346 was_running = po->running;
4347 num = po->num;
4348 if (was_running) {
4349 po->num = 0;
4350 __unregister_prot_hook(sk, false);
4351 }
4352 spin_unlock(&po->bind_lock);
4353
4354 synchronize_net();
4355
4356 err = -EBUSY;
4357 mutex_lock(&po->pg_vec_lock);
4358 if (closing || atomic_read(&po->mapped) == 0) {
4359 err = 0;
4360 spin_lock_bh(&rb_queue->lock);
4361 swap(rb->pg_vec, pg_vec);
4362 rb->frame_max = (req->tp_frame_nr - 1);
4363 rb->head = 0;
4364 rb->frame_size = req->tp_frame_size;
4365 spin_unlock_bh(&rb_queue->lock);
4366
4367 swap(rb->pg_vec_order, order);
4368 swap(rb->pg_vec_len, req->tp_block_nr);
4369
4370 rb->pg_vec_pages = req->tp_block_size/PAGE_SIZE;
4371 po->prot_hook.func = (po->rx_ring.pg_vec) ?
4372 tpacket_rcv : packet_rcv;
4373 skb_queue_purge(rb_queue);
4374 if (atomic_read(&po->mapped))
4375 pr_err("packet_mmap: vma is busy: %d\n",
4376 atomic_read(&po->mapped));
4377 }
4378 mutex_unlock(&po->pg_vec_lock);
4379
4380 spin_lock(&po->bind_lock);
4381 if (was_running) {
4382 po->num = num;
4383 register_prot_hook(sk);
4384 }
4385 spin_unlock(&po->bind_lock);
4386 if (pg_vec && (po->tp_version > TPACKET_V2)) {
4387 /* Because we don't support block-based V3 on tx-ring */
4388 if (!tx_ring)
4389 prb_shutdown_retire_blk_timer(po, rb_queue);
4390 }
4391
4392 if (pg_vec)
4393 free_pg_vec(pg_vec, order, req->tp_block_nr);
4394out:
4395 return err;
4396}
4397
4398static int packet_mmap(struct file *file, struct socket *sock,
4399 struct vm_area_struct *vma)
4400{
4401 struct sock *sk = sock->sk;
4402 struct packet_sock *po = pkt_sk(sk);
4403 unsigned long size, expected_size;
4404 struct packet_ring_buffer *rb;
4405 unsigned long start;
4406 int err = -EINVAL;
4407 int i;
4408
4409 if (vma->vm_pgoff)
4410 return -EINVAL;
4411
4412 mutex_lock(&po->pg_vec_lock);
4413
4414 expected_size = 0;
4415 for (rb = &po->rx_ring; rb <= &po->tx_ring; rb++) {
4416 if (rb->pg_vec) {
4417 expected_size += rb->pg_vec_len
4418 * rb->pg_vec_pages
4419 * PAGE_SIZE;
4420 }
4421 }
4422
4423 if (expected_size == 0)
4424 goto out;
4425
4426 size = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
4427 if (size != expected_size)
4428 goto out;
4429
4430 start = vma->vm_start;
4431 for (rb = &po->rx_ring; rb <= &po->tx_ring; rb++) {
4432 if (rb->pg_vec == NULL)
4433 continue;
4434
4435 for (i = 0; i < rb->pg_vec_len; i++) {
4436 struct page *page;
4437 void *kaddr = rb->pg_vec[i].buffer;
4438 int pg_num;
4439
4440 for (pg_num = 0; pg_num < rb->pg_vec_pages; pg_num++) {
4441 page = pgv_to_page(kaddr);
4442 err = vm_insert_page(vma, start, page);
4443 if (unlikely(err))
4444 goto out;
4445 start += PAGE_SIZE;
4446 kaddr += PAGE_SIZE;
4447 }
4448 }
4449 }
4450
4451 atomic_inc(&po->mapped);
4452 vma->vm_ops = &packet_mmap_ops;
4453 err = 0;
4454
4455out:
4456 mutex_unlock(&po->pg_vec_lock);
4457 return err;
4458}

4517static void *packet_seq_start(struct seq_file *seq, loff_t *pos)

4536}

4538static int packet_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
4539{
4540 if (v == SEQ_START_TOKEN)
4541 seq_puts(seq, "sk RefCnt Type Proto Iface R Rmem User Inode\n");
4542 else {
4543 struct sock *s = sk_entry(v);
4544 const struct packet_sock *po = pkt_sk(s);
4545
4546 seq_printf(seq,
4547 "%pK %-6d %-4d %04x %-5d %1d %-6u %-6u %-6lu\n",
4548 s,
4549 refcount_read(&s->sk_refcnt),
4550 s->sk_type,
4551 ntohs(po->num),
4552 po->ifindex,
4553 po->running,
4554 atomic_read(&s->sk_rmem_alloc),
4555 from_kuid_munged(seq_user_ns(seq), sock_i_uid(s)),
4556 sock_i_ino(s));
4557 }
4558
4559 return 0;
4560}

4585static int __net_init packet_net_init(struct net *net)
4586{
4587 mutex_init(&net->packet.sklist_lock);
4588 INIT_HLIST_HEAD(&net->packet.sklist);
4589
4590 if (!proc_create("packet", 0, net->proc_net, &packet_seq_fops))
4591 return -ENOMEM;
4592
4593 return 0;
4594}

4596static void __net_exit packet_net_exit(struct net *net)
4597{
4598 remove_proc_entry("packet", net->proc_net);
4599}

4607static void __exit packet_exit(void)
4608{
4609 unregister_netdevice_notifier(&packet_netdev_notifier);
4610 unregister_pernet_subsys(&packet_net_ops);
4611 sock_unregister(PF_PACKET);
4612 proto_unregister(&packet_proto);
4613}

4615static int __init packet_init(void)
4616{
4617 int rc = proto_register(&packet_proto, 0);
4618
4619 if (rc != 0)
4620 goto out;
4621
4622 sock_register(&packet_family_ops);
4623 register_pernet_subsys(&packet_net_ops);
4624 register_netdevice_notifier(&packet_netdev_notifier);
4625out:
4626 return rc;
4627}
